entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is describing a dream to someone in a breezy courtyard.

entities.name: fred and george
entities.description: Fred and George are headless and selling their magical hats from under their cloaks on the other side of the yard.

entities.name: bode
entities.description: Bode tried to steal a weapon that had defensive spells on it.

entities.name: st mungo's
entities.description: The Healer told Harry and the person he was talking to that Bode was recovering in St. Mungo's.

entities.name: the healer
entities.description: The Healer is a medical professional who treated Bode at St. Mungo's.

relationships.description: Harry was looking at Fred and George when he told the person about his dream.
Bode tried to steal a weapon that had defensive spells on it.
Harry and the person he was talking to visited St. Mungo's where Bode was recovering.
The Healer treated Bode at St. Mungo's.

relationships.entity_2: the person he was talking to
relationships.description: Harry told the person about his dream in a breezy courtyard.
